High priest
Rai-guy Bondalek, also known as Raigy, was a drow wizard and former high priest and a lieutenant of Bregan Daerthe.
Originally from the destroyed House Teyachumet of Ched Nasad,
In the , together with Kimmuriel Oblodra, another lieutenant of Bregan Daerthe, Rai-guy betrayed Jarlaxle when Jarlaxle began falling under the influence of the sentient artifact Crenshinibon. Rai-guy also desired Crenshinibon for himself. When he finally obtained it, however, he was killed by the red dragon Hephaestus after Jarlaxle tricked the wyrm into breathing fire on the crystal and subsequently its wielder, Rai-guy.
